name: Grimoire Finance Token
description: Grimoire Finance is a Decentralized Trading (spot & futures)Exchange and Yield Farming Protocol launching on the Fantom Opera network and later on Arbitrum Network. As a trading platform we're invested in developing a strong foundation with our Grimoire token (GRIM) as a DAO token, along with several farms, pools, and a unique deflationary protocol with an amazing APR called Grimoire Potions.
